img_summary: The image depicts a rare item known as the "Stone Essence," characterized by its appearance as a consolidated cluster of azure gravel. This item is obtained from the shattered remains of the Mother of Stones, an optional boss located in Yellow Wind Ridge. The Stone Essence plays a crucial role in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," as it is used on the talking Man-in-Stone along a specific path in Fright Cliff - Squall Hideout. The item is part of a series of key items that unlock paths and mechanisms throughout Chapter 2, contributing to the player's progression and exploration within the game's narrative.
